item.description:
Hi,

I have confirmed two tee times beginning at 10:20am for this Saturday.  I'm going to leave the rsvp open until tomorow morning as this is last minute and the course isn't that particular but I will need to confirm with them in the morning.  See everyone tomorrow, Cindi 339 224 1377 

 

I hope to book four or six tee times for this Saturday at Mt. Hood.  Unfortunately, everytime I think of calling them, its dark and they're closed so I don't have anything definate yet.  I'll call first thing in the morning and confirm.  They're running a $29 special for 18 holes for anyone interested.

Weather looks pretty good with little or no wind.

Hope to see you there and that I can get tee times :),

Cindi

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: Mt. Hood - 10:30 T Time Confirmed
